instruction: Please provide an overview of the key elements of the carbon markets.
output: The carbon markets operate on the premise that once carbon pricing has been fully internalized, they allow the market to drive resource allocation through purchasing credits or reducing emission levels. The link between carbon markets and global warming is key to the market's rapid growth and the achievement of net-zero emissions. Carbon derivatives are also emerging as an asset class in portfolios, and we will be discussing their applications and use cases in an upcoming blog.
